block.p: American League YANKEES--Agreed to terms with OF Luis Polonia on a contract for the remainder of the 2000 season. Designated INF Wilson Delgado for assignment. BOSTON RED SOX--Claimed 1B Rico Brogna off waivers from the Philadelphia Phillies.

American League YANKEES--Agreed to terms with OF Luis Polonia on a contract for the remainder of the 2000 season. Designated INF Wilson Delgado for assignment. BOSTON RED SOX--Claimed 1B Rico Brogna off waivers from the Philadelphia Phillies.
National League PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Purchased the contract of INF Tomas Perez from Scranton-Wilkes-Barre.

National Basketball Association NETS--Agreed to terms with F Johnny Newman on a multiyear contract. DETROIT PISTONS--Signed F Grant Hill and traded him to the Orlando Magic for G Chucky Atkins and F Ben Wallace. SAN ANTONIO SPURS--Re-signed G Avery Johnson. SEATTLE SUPERSONICS--Signed G Desmond Mason to a three-year contract. TORONTO RAPTORS--Signed F Tracy McGrady and traded him to the Orlando Magic for a future first-round draft pick.
National Football League INDIANAPOLIS COLTS--Signed QB Billy Joe Hobert. Waived QB Pete Gonzalez. KANSAS CITY CHIEFS--Signed G Will Shields to a one-year contract.

National Hockey League NHL--Promoted general manager Tom Richardson to president, NHL Interactive CyberEnterprises. BOSTON BRUINS--Agreed to terms with G John Grahame on a two-year contract. COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Signed C Bill Bowler, LW Sean Selmser and D Andrei Sryubko. DETROIT RED WINGS--Re-signed D Yan Golubovsky and F Marc Rodgers to one-year contracts, and Maxim Kuznetsov to a three-year contract. MONTREAL CANADIENS--Named Guy Carbonneau supervisor of prospects development. NASHVILLE PREDATORS--Signed LW Mike Watt. ISLANDERS--Signed F Taylor Pyatt to a three-year contract. Promoted Bill Kain to vice president, corporate sales, and Larry Fitzpatrick to ticket sales manager. Named Julie Favos corporate marketing manager, Cliff Gault group sales manager, Brian Reynolds outside ticket sales representative and Adam Ortiz group sales representative. PITTSBURGH PENGUINS--Signed F Josef Beranek. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Re-signed D Andrei Zyuzin to a one-year contract. WASHINGTON CAPITALS--Signed F Michal Sivek to a three-year contract.

U.S. SPEEDSKATING--Named Tom Cushman western regional coach, Matt Vraa interim northern regional coach, Stephen Gough assistant national short track coach, Tony Goskowicz and Scott Koons U.S. Olympic education center development coaches, and John Monroe development coordinator.
Major League Soccer METROSTARS--Promoted Ernesto Motta to director of Spanish broadcasting and communications. Named Orlando Conguta manager of team affairs and international games coordinator.

YESHIVA--Named Jody King assistant men's basketball coach and Heidi Baker Nathan women's tennis coach. BAYLOR--Named Mark Lumley, Brandi Landry and Chris Kuhlmeyer assistant softball coaches. BRIDGEPORT--Named William Khan men's assistant basketball coach. BROWN--Named Kim Yancey women's assistant basketball coach. CANISIUS--Announced the resignation of Hilary Nichols, women's tennis coach. EASTERN ILLINOIS--Named Adam Howarth men's soccer coach. ELON--Announced the school will compete in women's indoor and outdoor track and field during the 2000-01 academic year. Named Jackie Sgambati women's track and cross country coach. FRANCIS MARION--Named Art Inabinet baseball coach. GEORGIA TECH--Named Karen Copeland director of women's basketball operations and Sharon Krueger assistant head coach for women's swimming. IOWA--Announced the resignation of Beth Beglin, field hockey coach. Named Tracey Grisebaum field hockey coach, Lisa Cellucci assistant field hockey coach and David Sandstrum ticket manager. KING'S, PA.--Named Raymond Joseph women's coccer coach. MARQUETTE--Named Tod Kowalczyk men's assistant basketball coach. MINNESOTA-MANKATO--Named Christina Ruff assistant softball coach. MOUNT ST. JOSEPH--Named John Zoellner softball coach and Dane Neumeister coordinator of sports information and coordinator of intramural sports and recreation. OHIO STATE--Named Bruce Parkhill men's assistant basketball coach. QUINNIPIAC--Named Karen Byrne women's basketball caoch.
